Posts.Title: Waiting for test results in seven business days Candy125 Candy125

Posts.Content: Feb 1, 2013 04:37PM aprilmommy0205 wrote: I just went for my first appointment with the breast surgeon two days ago.  He looked at all my films and explained why the nodule I have is suspicious.  He did a medical history and an examination.  He told me what my options were (wait 6 mo. and recheck, biopsy, or surgery).  I am going with the biopsy.  I was told to allot about 2 hours for the biopsy and that I would be a bit sore after and would need to ice the area for 48 hours after.
